item.title: Goldman Sachs CEO is looking at how the Wall Street bank can get involved in prediction markets
item.description: Goldman's interest comes as prediction markets gain visibility and debate swirls over market transparency and regulatory boundaries.

item.title: Morgan Stanley earnings top estimates driven by wealth management
item.description: The wealth management unit posted $8.4 billion in net revenue in the most recent quarter, up from $7.5 billion a year earlier.

item.title: Goldman Sachs tops profit estimates as equities, asset and wealth management outperform
item.description: Goldman's revenue dipped 3% in Q4, which the company said was the result of off-loading the Apple Card loan portfolio to JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Fed's Goolsbee says inflation could come 'roaring back' if central bank independence goes away
item.description: "Anything that's infringing or attacking the independence of the central bank is a mess," Goolsbee told CNBC.

item.title: Under threat from Trump, Wall Street banks wager they can fend off credit card price controls
item.description: Five days after Trump's demand to cap credit card rates, bankers and lobbyists told CNBC they have yet to receive any formal or written guidance on th...
